And Ana is the perfect example how this can pay off. Just looking at her perfect white, yet scarily big teeth could make me swoon. They´re just to perfect in shape and whiteness.
Normally, Ana is the first one to brush her teeth in the morning, while I usually remain on her free hand, with her other hand holding and using toothbrush. Even if I´m on her free hand, it van still get quite shaky and bumpy on it, since the process of her brushing her teeth causes her entire body to shake slightly, with said slight shake still being relatively powerful, due to my size and its logical disadvantages.
And this time, it was the same as well. With both of us just having awoken from our well earned sleep, we went to the bathroom. And the first thing Ana did was getting the toothpaste out of the bathroom cabinet and putting it onto her toothbrush. Standing in front of the mirror, she started this daily ritual. I looked up this gorgeous girl´s perfect body with admiration. It might sound funny to be in awe at a girl like Ana while she´s brushing her teeth, but it´s in fact her every day actions that make her so special and cute. I consider this as some sort of reparation by God, so even if I can´t be as big as anyone else and even if I have to live like a tiny teen, Ana represents the single ray of hope in my life.
Well, you might wonder how I am usually brushing my teeth, but you´ll know soon enough. On this day, Ana finished the procedure of brushing her teeth rather quickly, and like many times before, she made a strange offer, yet an offer I could never refuse.

Bringing me nearer to her face, the black haired beauty looked at me quite annoyed.

I just grinned at her, and as she realized that I was just joking, she began to grin at me as well, revealing her shining white teeth.
